Career Profile

I am a Software Engineer graduated from the Facultad de Matemáticas de la Universidad Autónoma de Yucatán. I like to learn and implement projects with new technologies, also I like the Software Architecture and Software Design. During the last two years of my professional career I had the opportunity to work at Aluxoft, a startup located in Merida, Yucatan; it is mainly dedicated to develop iOS mobile apps. I started working as web developer and months later I was promoted to iOS developer where I developed the mobile version of another startup called “PikHub”. This startup was a social network to share photos in real time from iOS devices. I also worked on an iPhone app for face detection using the Open CV library (this library detects the faces). I also worked on another startup called Inuup, where I did similar activities as in Aluxoft. I graduated from college in 2012, then I moved to Monterrey in order to work in NIC México, a company dedicated to the administration of the .mx domain names and also to selling these domain names. I worked during my first months as an Information Systems Developer in the area dedicated to business projects, working as backend(Java) and frontend developer. Some time later I was promoted to the area dedicated to the operation of the business systems, also as a System Developer. In this area I used to develop new features in the systems that NIC México offers to its customers (which are thousands of customers), and also I used to fix any bug that these systems may had. These systems from the business unit known as Akky. My main goal is to contribute with my knowledge and skills in the area of ​​software engineering. In order to achieve this goal, I like to use my self initiative to gain new knowledge at every opportunity that is shows up, and also I like to use the best practices in developing quality software to improve the company. All this is specially motivated by my family, because I want to provide them a better life quality.

Projects

These are the projects where I have worked and contributed.

MDLive - Application for consulting with certified Doctors by video calls. Used technologies RxJava and Dagger2 among other.
Breakthrough App - Add new features and maintain the Android application.
Kuona - Migrate the Kuona Android app originally written in phonegap to Android native and maintain the iOS phonegap version.
Akky - Implement new features on software projects and also on live systems, as well as maintenance and bug fixing of live systems. I worked with Java, JSF, Oracle Database, among other technologies and frameworks developed by the company.
Virtual Tours - Support to create menus and media galleries in the development of an app for virtual tours to Chichen Itza. I was working in the mobile application with Objective-C and on the web services side with PHP and Zend framework.
EdiFactMX - Support for the development of the mobile application used for electronic invoicing. I was working in the mobile application with Objective-C and SQLite.
Shinigami Eyes - Application of mobile entertainment based on a Japanese show called 'Dead Note'. This app detects the faces of the people, this can be done by using the OpenCV library. Also it places a message over the person face in real time by focusing the camera of the IOS device on the person. I was working in the mobile application with Objective-C and a little of C.
Pikhub - Social network to share event's photos in real time. Integrated with another social networks as facebook and picassa. I worked in the mobile version of the app with Objective-C and the use of Web Services.
